answers.answer: Frequent urination is one sign of diabetes. However, there are two types of painful urination not associated with diabetes. One kind is the burning urine/pee, the other may be a cramping or stabbing pain you feel in your lower stomach region. Associated causes are STD and/or bacterial urinary tract infection. Get off the computer you need to see a doctor for a medical evaluation and treatment. Good luck
